apr: 12% – 18% (0% introductory rate for some clients for the first year)
strategy: Lines Of Credit are great because you only pay back what you have used. The interest rate does tend to be a bit higher because there isn’t a specific date you have to pay it back in. You want to position yourself for this type of financing because they will place a UCC filing on your business which is a blanket lien on all of your assets if you default. Once you have a UCC filing it severely hampers your ability to get more business term or revenue lending financing.

business_revenue: $5.000 in monthly credit and debit card sales
strategy: Revenue lending loans are great for short term needs. This loan usually has much higher interest rates and shorter terms. This is really the last option for your business if you need the money and you can not qualify for a term loan or SBA loan. Because they will place a UCC filing on your business which is a blanket lien on all of your assets if you default. Once you have a UCC filing it severely hampers your ability to get more business term or revenue lending financing.
